name: Ceremony
description:
To win the affection of a nobel lady
you need to score more points than your rivals. Points are rewarded for kills and for armor class and for how clean  is your armor looks at the Ceremony.

CONTROLS

WASD - movement

Left CLICK (under cursor) - Attack enemy, Pick item, Open door

Double Right CLICK (on potion in inventory)- Use potion that cleans armor a bit

Gameplay

The castle is attacked minutes before ceremony. But that does not stop brave knights from participating in party.

You must defend the castle and still find time to make sure at the end you look better than your rivals.

As ceremony starts you need to be on a purple line. Only persons on that line are really considered by noble lady.

Every your attack decreases cleanliness of your armor.

You can use cleaning potions to restore it or just find another armor.

some items are locked behind tbe doors. You need to find keys to the doors with similar colors.
